title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: HS30072Course ContentsIntroduction to Common Property Regime: Definition, Scope and the Context; Common Property Resources versus Private, State and Open Access Resources; Access to CPR and Livelihood Strategies in India; Status and Extent of CPR and its Management in India; Problems of Commons: Tragedy of Commons; Theories of CPR Management: Collective Action and Participation, Game Theory and CPR Management; Agency Theory and CPR Management; The Evolutionary Model; Institutions and CPR Management: Decentralisation and Devolution of CPR Management, Evolution of Co-Management System; Ostroms Eight Principles of Self-Governing Institutions; Analysis of Failure and Success of CPR Management: Water, Forests, Grazing Lands, Biodiversity, Irrigation.
